long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RemindX: AI - Powered Reminders from Your Twitter Feed

With RemindX, you can transform Twitter into an efficient productivity tool. This is a Chrome extension specifically designed for the Web3 space, ensuring you never miss important events and milestones in the crypto world.

üöÄ Key Features:
‚Ä¢ One-Click Reminder Creation: Simply click the "Calendar" button next to any tweet to instantly generate a structured reminder.
‚Ä¢AI - Powered Content Extraction: Our sophisticated AI analyzes tweet content to create smart, context - aware reminders.
‚Ä¢Seamless Calendar Integration: Sync your reminders directly with your preferred calendar app, ensuring you never miss a beat.
‚Ä¢Token Details Card: Real-time display of token details, unlocking status, and investor information mentioned in the tweets.
‚Ä¢Sleek Sidebar Interface: Manage your reminders without leaving Twitter.

‚è±Ô∏èSave Time, Boost Productivity:
No more context switching or manually copying information.RemindX streamlines your workflow, allowing you to capture ideas and commitments as they happen in your Twitter timeline.
